strapiPost.title: Walton College Graduate Supply Chain Program Ranked No. 2 In North America
strapiPost.content:
The supply chain management graduate program at the Sam M. Walton College of Business has been ranked No. 2 in the nation by research and consulting firm Gartner. 

  • Training ground: Every two years, Gartner evaluates supply chain management academic programs based on industry value and program scope and size. Walton Collegeâ€™s Master of Science in Supply Chain Management was launched in 2020 and prepares students for leadership roles in operations, sourcing, planning, logistics, and new product placement. 
  • Up top: The University of Arkansas is a leader in supply chain management academic programs as its undergraduate supply chain management program is currently ranked No. 1 in the nation, also by Gartner.
